data.title: Tivoli Netview
meta_keywords: IBM Tivoli Netview - Distributed Network Monitoring
data.meta_description:
Tivoli NetView is distributed network management software that helps keep your important business systems available.

It discovers TCP/IP networks, displays topologies, monitors network health and gathers performance data so that you can quickly identify the root cause of network failures.
data.text:
Tivoli NetView is distributed network management software that helps keep your important business systems available.

It discovers TCP/IP networks, displays topologies, monitors network health and gathers performance data so that you can quickly identify the root cause of network failures.

Use this scalable distributed network management solution to measure availability and provide fault isolation for problem management.

Manage network areas that are segmented by highly restrictive firewalls.

Compartmentalize or restrict operator actions and views of the network.

Maintain device inventory for asset management.

Enjoy the simplicity of using the Web console that is part of this network management software to complete administration tasks.

Develop reports on network trends and analyze network data.
